title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.5 - Standards of assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.5 - Standards of assistance

State Regulations

The forms and standards to be used for furnishing
emergency financial assistance shall be those established by regulations of the

State Department of Social Services filed for administering its current
emergency assistance program. The amount of the allowances shall be determined
from the approved social services allowance schedules in effect immediately
prior to attack, subject to any additional governmental limitations which may
be imposed in an emergency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
508.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
